title: MUGCLUB EXCLUSIVE: Sports Trivia and Q&A with the Hodgetwins | Louder with Crowder
description: Steven and the Conservative Twins play a sports trivia game to see how much Steven knows about sports. Then they answer Q&A and talk about the skills needed as an entrepreneur, how to defend yourself, and Steven's take on recreational use of weed. #mma #careeradvice #superbowl
